Trade/Device Name(s): Monoclonal Rabbit Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor α antibody, Clone SP1
Dako Monoclonal Rabbit Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor, Clone SP1
Dako Monoclonal Rabbit Estrogen Receptor α, Clone SP1
Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections of human breast cancer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dako Monoclonal Rabbit Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor α antibody, Clone SP1, for semi-quantitative detection of estrogen receptor in breast cancer tissue by immunohistochemistry
Indications for Use Summary: For semi-quantitative detection of human estrogen receptor in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast cancer tissue sections by immunohistochemistry to aid in therapy response assessment and prognosis.
